reviewText:
Let me start by saying this 2nd documentaey was way better than the 1st one. It gave you more info on rich porter. The first documentary to rich porter has 3 stars...I have to give this one 4 stars cause the info on rich porter is so much more than the first. As A Matter of fact,they should have made this one first. Besides people that knew rich,that bought the 1st documentary,obviously bought the 2nd. Alot of his fans did not buy the 2nd documentary cause they didn't enjoy the first one.
Buy the 2nd a must have for rich porter fans! way better thann 1st.this one igives a lot more info,details etc. On rich lorters life
